org.grails.plugin.resource.gsp
[Groovy] Class GspResourceMeta

java.lang.Object
  org.grails.plugin.resource.ResourceMeta
      org.grails.plugin.resource.gsp.GspResourceMeta

class GspResourceMeta
extends ResourceMeta

Synthetic resource that compiles a GSP to a target file.

Authors:
Stefan Kendell
Francis McKenzie

Method Detail

beginPrepare

@Override
void beginPrepare(java.lang.Object grailsResourceProcessor)
Overridden method that gets called by grailsResourceProcessor when processing this resource (either on startup or when changed). This method triggers the GSP compilation.

compileGsp

protected java.lang.String compileGsp(java.util.Map gsp)
Performs the compilation of the specified GSP, and returns the output. Note that the GSP will be looked up by URI (i.e. not by actual file path)
Parameters:
gsp - Map containing 'uri', 'file' and 'type' elements
Returns:
Output of compilation as String
